constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 141 (Friday, August 6, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. TORRES of New York:
H.R. 4980.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8.
[Page H4321]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Transportation and Maritime Security.

title: To direct the Secretary of Homeland Security to ensure that any individual traveling on a flight that departs from or arrives to an airport inside the United States or a territory of the United States is fully vaccinated against COVID-19, and for other purposes.
